data.description:
FIGHT together against different enemies in the Hex7 Battle Arena.
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.                                                                                                                                                           
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent-iad3-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974468_332017743231769_3438180485989163490_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=AtG5QdXvSXsQ7kNvgHIHw22&_nc_ht=scontent-iad3-2.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYC88iIgqH09MPKlfhZwPWtcRBbDYB9QpLtWw3Uv-LSEGg&oe=67090A37)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game a much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent-iad3-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75507168_1446865232891556_3763410573840822716_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=ph8IoYModYIQ7kNvgH3fePW&_nc_ht=scontent-iad3-2.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYC4OCniCUBvylF8IFMcrLH5-dzS1Mhy_-AS1lOmNNyJhw&oe=670917D2)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent-iad3-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39003262_985625342809911_4235982824831484550_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=Ybj7e80J8gAQ7kNvgE0mVtw&_nc_ht=scontent-iad3-2.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDRjF6WqUi8tg46ZtQTeM6Fs0ZtRQSaLhJaEF97JlWU3w&oe=67090309)
